solution.text:
we know cos(30)=\(\sqrt 3\over 2\)
we know cosec(60)=\(2\over \sqrt 3\)
we know cot(45)= 1
we know sin(30)=\( 1\over 2\)
putting the values in the expression we get
\({{_{j}_\times 3\over 4}+{_{k}_\times 4\over 3}-{_{l}_}}\over 1\)
_{{trunc(Decimal(j)*3/4,2)}}_+_{{trunc(Decimal(k)*4/3,2)}}_-_{l}_
_{{trunc((Decimal(j)*3/4)+(Decimal(k)*4/3)-l,2)}}_

content.text:
Solve and find the value of the expression given below
\(_{j}_cos^2(30)+_{k}_cosec^2(60)-_{l}_cot^2(45)\over sin^2(30) + cos^2(30)\)
